sentences.en: Come and visit me whenever you want.
sentences.cn: 你随便什么时候想来看我就来吧。

sentences.en: He married Miss Vancouver in 1963, or whenever it was.
sentences.cn: 他好像在1963年还是什么时候娶了当时的温哥华小姐。

sentences.en: I was disappointed whenever the cook found fault with my work.
sentences.cn: 每当厨师挑剔我干的活儿时，我都非常沮丧。

sentences.en: if you lay eyes on him, either tonight or tomorrow or whenever, call me straight away.
sentences.cn: 今晚，明天或者其他任何时候，如果你看到他，立刻给我打电话。

sentences.en: Most authorities recommend letting the baby nurse whenever it wants.
sentences.cn: 大部分权威人士建议婴儿饿了就随时喂奶。

sentences.en: Relax and take a breather whenever you feel that you need one.
sentences.cn: 要放松，什么时候觉得需要休息就休息一下。

sentences.en: She always called at the vicarage whenever she was in the area.
sentences.cn: 只要她在那一带，她总会去拜访教区牧师。

sentences.en: She still got goose bumps whenever he walked into the room.
sentences.cn: 只要他一走进房间，她仍旧会起鸡皮疙瘩。

sentences.en: Shops are no longer allowed to push up their prices whenever they want.
sentences.cn: 再不允许商店想什么时候提价就提价了。

sentences.en: The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.cn: 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.en: Their colleagues insulted them whenever the opportunity presented itself.
sentences.cn: 一有机会，同事们就会侮辱他们。

sentences.en: They were always there by you, whenever you needed them.
sentences.cn: 无论何时你需要他们，他们总是在你身边。

sentences.en: They were always there by you， whenever you needed them.
sentences.cn: 无论何时你需要他们，他们总是在你身边。

sentences.en: Whenever I get into a relationship, I always fall madly in love.
sentences.cn: 我每次谈恋爱都深陷其中，无法自拔。

sentences.en: Whenever I get the chance I go to Maxim's for dinner.
sentences.cn: 我一有机会便去马克西姆餐厅吃饭。

sentences.en: Whenever I have a cold I get a nosebleed.
sentences.cn: 每次我感冒都会流鼻血。

sentences.en: Whenever I open my mouth I don't half waffle on.
sentences.cn: 我无论何时开口，从不夸夸其谈。

sentences.en: Whenever recession strikes, a chain reaction is set into motion.
sentences.cn: 只要经济不景气，连锁反应就开始了。

sentences.en: Whenever she refused, he'd beat her black and blue.
sentences.cn: 只要她拒绝他，他就会把她打得青一块紫一块。

sentences.en: Whenever there was a dance he and I led off.
sentences.cn: 任何一支舞都是我和他领跳。

sentences.en: You may have free passage across our territory whenever you require it.
sentences.cn: 无论你什么时候需要，都可以自由穿过我们的领地。

trans.tran_cn: 无论何时，每当，任何时间（都行），不知什么时候
